message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exclusive product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $11,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but  $11,500 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $11,000.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,750?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay a premium for this product. I'll try to meet you at $11,250, but that's as low as I can go.
